stages.title: Target Repo
stages.message: Select the target repository for which this description is intended.

items.help_tip: Select a target repository
items.label: Target Repository

trigger.message:
Changing the target repository will lead to some adjustments in the wizard to reflect update to the metadata requirements.

Please note that previous entries may be lost as a result of the change.

stages.title: Study Type
stages.message: Select the study type under which the datafiles were created. The study type presents a controlled vocabulary for expressing the overall purpose of the study.

items.help_tip: Select Study Type from the drop-down list
items.label: Study Type

trigger.message:
Changing the study type will lead to some adjustments in the wizard to reflect update to the metadata requirements.

Please note that previous entries may be lost as a result of the change.

stages.title: Sample
stages.message: Select and associate a sample to files in the bundle. A Sample defines an isolate of sequenceable material upon which sequencing experiments has been based.

items.help_tip: Specify the sample you used in your study
items.label: Sample

stages.title: Library Construction
stages.message: Specify the origin of the material that may have been sequenced, and any treatments that the material might have undergone that affect the sequencing result.

items.help_tip: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads
items.label: Library layout

trigger.message:
Changing the library layout will lead to some adjustments in the wizard to reflect update to the metadata requirements.

Please note that previous entries may be lost as a result of the change.

items.help_tip: Select the sequencing technique intended for this library
items.label: Library strategy

items.help_tip: Select the sequencing technique intended for this library
items.label: Library source

items.help_tip: Select the method that was used to select for or against, enrich, or screen the material being sequenced
items.label: Library selection

items.help_tip: Enter the name and version of the quality scoring software
items.label: Quality scorer

items.help_tip: Specify the sequencing instrument model and make
items.label: Sequencing Instrument

stages.title: Datafiles Pairing
stages.message: In this stage, you will be able to pair up datafiles in the description bundle for which the library layout has been set to 'PAIRED'.

items.help_tip: Select a datafile to pair
items.label: Paired Datafile
